common_2160_rival_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)]! You DID it!
Congratulations\r
on\r
winning\r
it all![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2160_rival_11:
I’m so happy, it almost made me forget the pain
of everyone using Arven’s stupid “School Battle\r
Brawl” name![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2160_system_01: You got the [VAR COLOR(0008)]Sporty Cap (Pokémon League)[VAR COLOR(0000)]!
common_2160_rival_03:
Director Clavell told me he got caught up in all
the excitement and forgot to give it to you![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2160_rival_04:
[VAR BD06(0000)]So I guess you get the strongest-in-the-school
throne for now, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].\r
Keep\r
it\r
warm\r
for me![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2160_rival_05:
I’m gonna be in the tournament next time, and
I’ll be coming right for ya![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2160_rival_06:
Whenever you feel like entering the tournament
again, just talk to the staffer at the front desk.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2160_rival_07:
Y’know, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]...\c
I’ve relished every day since you moved here to
Paldea and became my rival.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2160_rival_08: I’m so glad I met you. I mean it![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2160_rival_09: Heh! C’mon. Don’t make me blush![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2160_rival_10:
Anyway, I’ll be seeing you on the battle court...
for a good long time to come![VAR 0114(0004)]
